channel.title: [HELP]Animation
channel.description:
Well, I gave animation a try. And I'm stumped. I'm trying to get 2 pictures from the middle to gradually slide out, and when the fully slide out, my name will flash between them. But, I go to make the last frame move out, and then all my other frames change too.
If this isn't explained well enough, Look at this video.
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9AZYVBEE

item.title: [HELP]Animation
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

What you need to do to tween is:

  1. Make 2 frames.
  2. Click on the second one you created.
  3. Change the positions of the images for how you want it to tween (didn’t make much sense :-/)
  4. Tween them.

I hope that helped.

Read full topic
